table.name: MercatorTable
table.displayName: Retrieve multiple sequence alignment or multi-FASTA

table.displayName: Regions/Spans associated by eQTL experiment on HB3 x DD2 progeny (LOD cut off = 1.5)

columnAttribute.name: ec_number
columnAttribute.help: Enzyme Commission classification of enzyme based on the reactions they catalyze

columnAttribute.name: ec_description
columnAttribute.help: Enzyme Commission classification description of this assignment

columnAttribute.name: ec_source
columnAttribute.help: The source of this EC assignment

columnAttribute.name: ontology
columnAttribute.help: Top level term for GO ontology

columnAttribute.name: source
columnAttribute.help: Source of the annotation

columnAttribute.name: evidence_code
columnAttribute.help: Evidence code provided by source

columnAttribute.name: is_not
columnAttribute.help: Indicates that this is Not an assignment for this protein

table.name: Orthologs
table.sorting: is_syntenic desc, has_comment desc, gene asc

table.name: PdbSimilarities
table.displayName: Similarities to Protein Data Bank (PDB) Chains

columnAttribute.displayName: Position relative to annotated CDS start

columnAttribute.displayName: Position relative to annotated CDS end

textAttribute.name: snpoverview
textAttribute.text:
Total SNPs All Strains: $$gene_total_hts_snps$$
NonSynonymous SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_nonsynonymous_snps$$
Noncoding SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_noncoding_snps$$
Stop Codon SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_stop_codon_snps$$
Synonymous SNPs All Strains: $$gene_hts_synonymous_snps$$
Nonsyn/Syn SNP Ratio All Strains: $$gene_hts_nonsyn_syn_ratio$$
